attributes.action: Bring back Top of the Pops
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Top of the Pops wasn`t just another tv programme it was like the news a vital programme. It had been on for 40 years,now like then music is still an important part of our culture and the BBC just axed it. They are the respected broadcaster and the one we pay for so they had no right to takeaway our programme so please Prime Minister bring it back.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
